name: Airtok
description: What are AI Reflections Tokens? AI Reflections Token's are a new concept introduced by Airtok The concept is to leverage a combination of "built-for-purpose" AI models such as, OpenAI, Stable Diffusion, ElevenLabs, Llama and others, to create a team of advanced AI agents that work together to market the token. This innovative approach free's up time for Dev teams to focus on building their projects core functionality rather than answering questions like "wen lambo?" or trying to come up with new X (Twitter) posts to use in their raids. Our aim is for Airtok to become a bolt-on AI marketing tool for any crypto token. What does "Airtok" mean? The name Airtok was simply derived from AI Reflections TOKen
